thread.section_title: Ruby Rose OITNB News, Photos and Instagram Updates | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: Rose and Jessica Origliasso at pre-Oscar event in LA
thread.title_full: Ruby Rose and Jessica Origliasso at pre-Oscar event in LA | Daily Mail Online

author: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
title: Rose and Jessica Origliasso at pre-Oscar event in LA
text:
She's the Australian starlet who hit the jackpot in some of Hollywood's big box office hits including xXx: Return of Xander Cage and Resident Evil: The Final Chapter.
But Ruby Rose is taking a break from filming Pitch Perfect and in preparation mode for the Oscars .
The 30-year-old was seen attending a pre-Oscar event in Los Angeles, alongside girlfriend Jessica Origliasso, from the Australian band The Veronicas.
Pre-Oscar mode: Actress Ruby Rose attended Kari Feinstein's Pre-Oscar Style Lounge at the Andaz Hotel in Los Angeles with girlfriend, musician Jessica Origliasso
The loved up pair were hand in hand posing for the cameras at Kari Feinstein's Pre-Oscar Style Lounge at the Andaz Hotel.
Both opting for their version of a relaxed, yet eclectic style for their outfits.
Ruby donned an over-sized army camouflage coat, keeping her ornate tattoos covered up and skinny black jeans.
Hand-in-hand: Ruby donned an over-sized army camouflage coat, keeping her ornate tattoos covered up and skinny black jeans
Loved up: Jessica kept the look demure adding a black fur coat with a blue trimmed collar on top of her look
The actress, who also stars in Orange Is The New Black, accessorised her look with a pair of dark, reflective, cat eye sunglasses, and paired it casual black sneakers with white laces.
She kept her makeup look minimal with a pink shiny lip that accentuated their natural plumpness.
Meanwhile the petite musician wore a pair of cute sandal heels, matched with black wide leg pants.
Red carpet glam: Ruby has starred in Hollywood box office hits including John Wick: Chapter Two alongside Keanu Reeves
The 32-year-old raven haired beauty, showed off her slender frame and midriff in a corset style top.
But Jessica kept the look demure adding a black fur coat with a blue trimmed collar on top of her look.
The couple was also seen petting an adorable black Pomeranian puppy at the event, much to Jessica's delight.
Late Night! She recently made an appearance on Late Night With Seth Meyers and has been busy filming for Pitch Perfect three in Atlanta
Ruby has been busy in Atlanta filming the third installment of musical comedy Pitch Perfect.
In an interview with Entertainment Tonight the actress opened about her relationship to the singer calling her 'the most amazing person' and her 'moral compass'.
'We just jam every night. We just play music and sing and cook dinner, and she's amazing. She's wonderful.'
'The most amazing person': Ruby recently described her girlfriend Jessica Origliasso, from the Australian band The Veronicas, as wonderful and her moral compass
